name: Proximity Wars
description:
The blue faction grows more and more unstable as time goes on. Starting from just one ore harvester, can you defeat the unstable blue faction before it's too late? 

Instructions:

  • Use your little red squares to mine (grey boxes)
  • Build barracks from your home bases (large squares)
  • Build units from your barracks (large red circles)
  • Your "Fighter" units will attack enemy targets in their proximity 
  • Use mouse to pan around
